GSD.description:
xtensa: xtfpga: Fix refcount leak bug in setup

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.127 by commit 6c0839cf1b9e1b3c88da6af76794583cbfae8da3. For more details please see the references link.
